came.pipeline.preprocess_unaligned¶

came.pipeline.preprocess_unaligned(adatas, key_class: str, use_scnets: bool = True, n_pcs: int = 30, nneigh_scnet: int = 5, nneigh_clust: int = 20, ntop_deg: int = 50)¶

Steps: * preprocessing * candidate genes (HVGs and DEGs) * pre-clustering query data * single-cell network
